divs: Sighting DetailsMy Mom and I were traveling down a road thru a Canyon called Santiago Canyon on our way home. I was looking up at the stars and I saw 2 Triagular Shaped Objects that had bright tinted Blue lights at the tips. They were going in a straight slow direction and then they flew up slowly towards the sky and disappeared. And my Mom saw the tip of one of the Flying Objects too. I was really shocked and scared at the same time. I told my Mom that there was something in the sky. I believe I experience a sighting of a UFO.
Summary: I saw a Triagular UFO coming home through Santiago Canyon with my Mom
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Irvine
There were no other sightings in Irvine on or around August 15th 2006
